description:
Get everything you need to be prepared for emergencies with the official app of the Georgia Emergency Management Agency. Find out about disasters in advance with geo-targeted weather and emergency alerts. Locate nearby open shelters and check live traffic conditions. Get prepared with an emergency supplies checklist and create a disaster plan for your family.
 
This is Georgia's official emergency preparedness iOS application, brought to you by the Georgia Emergency Management Agency/Homeland Security (GEMA) and the Georgia Department of Public Health. Its goal is to provide an all-inclusive, singular mobile resource for Georgia residents to access accurate and timely information before and in the event of an emergency. For more information, visit ready.ga.gov. 
 
Features include: 
-Geo-targeted weather and emergency alerts
-Live traffic map and list of incidents
-Ready Profile for emergency plans and checklist of supplies
-Map of nearby open shelters 
-Information on what to do during different types of emergencies 
-Hurricane evacuation routes 
-Disaster history for your location 
-Map of historical tornado touchdowns
releaseNotes:
- Various bug fixes
- A new badge icon to show you the current count of push notifications that haven't been viewed
- New Threat sections: Ebola and Winter Weather Driving
